intro.title: The Earth's Features
intro.subtitle: A glimpse into the diverse geological formations and climates.

outro.title: The Earth's Features
outro.subtitle: A glimpse into the diverse geological formations and climates.

facts.title: Grand Canyon
facts.description: A massive canyon carved by the Colorado River over millions of years in Arizona, USA.

facts.title: Victoria Falls
facts.description: One of the largest waterfalls in the world, located on the border of Zambia and Zimbabwe.

facts.title: Mount Kilimanjaro
facts.description: Africa's highest peak, a dormant volcano in Tanzania.

facts.title: Permafrost
facts.description: Permanently frozen ground found in the Arctic regions, crucial for climate studies.

facts.title: Equator
facts.description: The imaginary line that divides the Earth into the Northern and Southern Hemispheres.
